songs.title: U Know U Want To
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
You know you want to
You know you want to
You know you want to
You know you want to
You're scared
You know you want to
Sheesh, yeah

[Verse 1]
Listen, you acting like you gon' leave me girl
But you know you love me
Said the last time was the last time but you wanna fuck me
You know you want to
You know you want to, yeah

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause you think about me every night and day
Don't you worry shorty 'cause you know I feel the same
Don't leave me, girl
Don't you leave me, girl
Don't leave me, girl
Don't you leave me, girl
Wanna take me back but your friends saying, no
Just ignore what your friends say, and
Wanna forgive me and forget about it
But it's too hard to forget about it
Your body's saying yes, but your mind saying no
Baby girl you can stay you don't have to go
Nowhere, nowhere
You can stay right here 'cause

[Chorus]
You know you want to
You know you want to
You know you want to
You know you want to, yeah

[Verse 2]
Now you're saying that we're over
And you plan to leave me?
But I heard that before, girl, I don't believe it
You know you want to
You know you want to, yeah

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause you think about me every night and day
Don't you worry shorty 'cause you know I feel the same
Don't leave me, girl
Don't you leave me, girl
Don't leave me, girl
Don't you leave me, girl
Wanna take me back but your friends saying, no
Just ignore what your friends say, and
Wanna forgive me and forget about it
But it's too hard to forget about it
Your body's saying yes, but your mind saying no
Baby girl you can stay you don't have to go
Nowhere, nowhere
You can stay right here 'cause

[Chorus]
You know you want to
You know you want to
You know you want to
You know you want to, yeah

[Bridge]
'Cause you think about me every night and day
Don't you worry shorty 'cause you know I feel the same
Don't leave me, girl
Don't you leave me, girl
Don't leave me, girl
Don't you leave me, girl

[Verse 3]
Condos, penthouse put yo name on the E
Sunday, Sunday I gave you them keys
Keys to every car took you anywhere you want
I bought you anything you saw
I don't even know who you are
Here no more
You say you're done with me but that ain't so
If you wanted me to leave
Then let me go
You're laying here in my bed
My hand between your legs
Took back everything you said

[Outro]
'Cause you think about me every night and day
Don't you worry shorty cause you know I feel the same
Don't leave me, girl
Don't you leave me, girl
Don't leave me, girl
Don't you leave me, girl
